raw.reasoning: Using max-h-40 for channels and max-h-32 for archived channels on mobile (md:max-h-none removes constraint on desktop) with overflow-y-auto to make sections scrollable without blocking agent list access

retrospective.summary: Added responsive max-height and scroll to channels and archived channels sections on mobile. Channels: max-h-40, Archived: max-h-32, both with md:max-h-none overflow-y-auto
